Items.Title: Application No. N 160051 ZRY submitted by the New York City Department of City Planning pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to create the Mandatory Inclusionary Housing program that would require, through zoning actions, a share of new housing to be permanently affordable.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: Proposed authorizing resolution submitted by the Mayor pursuant to Section 363 of the Charter for the granting of franchises for installation of telecommunications equipment and facilities on, over and under the inalienable property of the City in connection with the provision of mobile telecommunications services.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Granting of franchises for installation of telecommunications equipment and facilities on, over and under the inalienable property of the City in connection with the provision of mobile telecommunications services. (20165265 GFY)

Items.Title: Proposed authorizing resolution submitted by the Mayor pursuant to Section 363 of the Charter for the granting of franchises for installation of telecommunications equipment and facilities on, over and under the inalienable property of the City in connection with the provision of mobile telecommunications services.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Subcommittee
Items.MatterName: Granting of franchises for installation of telecommunications equipment and facilities on, over and under the inalienable property of the City in connection with the provision of mobile telecommunications services. (20165265 GFY)

Items.Title: Application No. N 160051 ZRY submitted by the New York City Department of City Planning pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to create the Mandatory Inclusionary Housing program that would require, through zoning actions, a share of new housing to be permanently affordable.
